Changeset.Change: Added support for generic resource deletion, node retrieval by hostname and port and node unregistration
Integration with latest node selection and collocation functionality
Added GetMatchingNodes method, which returns all candidates without performing selection. Motivation: PE2ng improvements in matchmaking #263
Integration with node selection and collocation functionality
Added support for open ended host information publishing and matching
Added support in InformationSystem interface for OpenSearch queries
Added support in InformationSystem interface for Condor related queries
